title: Communicating with kinder kids
creator_credit: Bob Scarfe and TV Ed Productions
brief_description: A video “test” for interested groups e.g. health care workers, audiologists, speech therapists, kindergarten teachers and parents, so that they can recognise language and speech disorders in kindergarten age children.
